question: National Road Safety Week is observed in which month?
explanation: National Road Safety Week is observed generally in Second week of January every year. However, Ministry of Road Transport & Highways, Govt. of India has announced the observance of 30th Road Safety Week Campaign form 4th to 10th February 2019. The theme for year 2019 campaign is Sadak Suraksha â€“ Jeevan Raksha.
